original_title: Mahinda Rajapaksa hosts Ifthar in Colombo
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa hosted an Ifthar at his official residence located down Wijerama Mawatha in Colombo.

Ifthar is the evening meal of Muslims during the month of Ramadan to break the far, and the ifthar at the Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa's residence was attended by diplomats, muslim religios leaders and others.
Minister Ali Sabry PC, and MP Rauff Hakeem were among those present.
